metadata.feature_description: Displays statistics about tag usage across community content with pagination support

steps.expected: Successfully logged in and PersonaBar visible
steps.actual: Successfully logged in, PersonaBar visible with Dashboard, Content, Manage, Page Analytics, Settings options

steps.action: Clicked on Dashboard menu in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Dashboard menu expands showing Site Analytics and Community Analytics options
steps.actual: Dashboard menu expanded correctly showing Site Analytics and Community Analytics options

steps.action: Clicked on Community Analytics menu item
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard panel opens showing analytics data including Tags section
steps.actual: Panel content area remains blank/empty. JavaScript error in console: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics panel from loading: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function
Error occurs in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025 during dashboardClass.init
The utility.serializeCustomDate function is undefined or not properly loaded

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View tag statistics for different time periods

steps.action: Attempted to access Community Analytics panel to view Tags section
steps.expected: Tags section visible with time period filter options
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel failed to load due to JavaScript error - Tags section not accessible

issues: Cannot test time period filtering because Community Analytics panel does not load
Prerequisite failure: Community Analytics dashboard initialization fails with JavaScript error

steps.action: Attempted to access Community Analytics panel to test tag pagination
steps.expected: Tags table visible with pagination controls (prev/next buttons)
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel failed to load due to JavaScript error - pagination controls not accessible

issues: Cannot test pagination because Community Analytics panel does not load
Code review confirms pagination exists in pageActivities.js component with prev/next controls

steps.action: Attempted to access Community Analytics panel to test tag sorting
steps.expected: Tags displayed with count column, sortable by usage count
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel failed to load due to JavaScript error - sorting not accessible

issues: Cannot test sorting because Community Analytics panel does not load
Code review shows tags are displayed with label and count columns in pageActivities component

steps.action: Attempted to access Community Analytics panel to verify tag counts
steps.expected: Tag counts displayed accurately reflecting actual tag usage in community content
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel failed to load due to JavaScript error - tag counts not accessible

issues: Cannot verify tag count accuracy because Community Analytics panel does not load
GetTagStats API endpoint exists in CommunityAnalyticsController.cs but UI is inaccessible

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test empty state when no tags exist

steps.action: Attempted to access Community Analytics panel to test empty state
steps.expected: No Data Available message displayed when no tags exist, with placeholder graphics
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel failed to load due to JavaScript error - empty state not testable

issues: Cannot test empty state because Community Analytics panel does not load
Code review confirms empty state handling exists: results().length === 0 shows 'No Data Available' message with placeholder images

observations: The Community Analytics module has a critical JavaScript bug that prevents initialization
Error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function occurs during dashboardClass.init()
The error is in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025
The utility object exists but is missing the serializeCustomDate function
Code review of CommunityAnalyticsController.cs shows GetTagStats endpoint with parameters: period, comparativeTerm, startDate, endDate, pageIndex, pageSize
Code review of pageActivities.js shows Knockout component with pagination (prev/next), label/count columns, and empty state handling
All Tag Statistics Analytics features exist in code but are completely inaccessible via UI due to initialization failure
This appears to be a dependency or build issue where a required utility function is not being loaded
